parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: The number of entries to return in each call. Valid values: **1** to **100**. Default value: **20**.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description:
The pagination token used to specify a particular page of results. Valid values:

*   Left this parameter empty if this is the first query or the only query.
*   Set this parameter to the value of NextToken obtained from the previous query.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the NLB instance.

You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~443657~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ServerGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the server group.

parameters.name: ServerIds
parameters.description: The IDs of the backend servers. You can specify up to 40 backend servers in each call.

parameters.name: ServerIps
parameters.description: The IP addresses of the backend servers. You can specify up to 40 backend servers in each call.
